title.rendered: How to Stand Out to Employers at Virtual Recruiting Events

content.rendered:
In a year when hiring is all online, virtual recruiting events on Handshake are your key to finding a great job or internship. So, how can you impress employers from the comfort of your room? Our team shares tips for standing out to employers during a virtual event, including:

  1. Arrive on time and dress professionally
  2. Be an active listener
  3. Ask thoughtful questions

Watch the full video below to learn how to make a great impression.
